name: Chroonia's Cabin Adventure
description:
Follow Chroonia and her adventure through a haunted and abandoned cabin. Fight through the enemies and get to the end of the cabin!

**DO NOT **

**OPEN INVENTORY WHILE OUTSIDE**

**USE THE YELLOW ARROW IN THE INVENTORY**

Controls

  1. Left stick/WASD/Arrows Keys - Move
  2. A Button/K Key/Button South (Controller) - Attack 
  3. X Button/J Key/Button East (Controller) - Dash/Dodge
  4. Start/ESC - Open Inventory
  5. LT Button/RT Button/E Key/Q Key - Switch Tabs
